title: 274: Q&A: Proposals, Bachelor/ette Parties, & Weddings!
itunes:title: 274: Q&A: Proposals, Bachelor/ette Parties, & Weddings!
description:
The Broads are here to try their hand at being wedding planners and answer the #broadsquad’s questions regarding weddings, engagements, and bachelor/ette parties! They chat proposals, wedding speeches, honeymoon locations, weddings on a budget, ring shopping, specific bachelor/ette party requests, and more!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***THRIVE MARKET: Go to THRIVEMARKET.COM/CHATTY to get $20 off your first order AND a free gift!

 ***JUNESHINE: Receive 20% off PLUS free shipping site-wide at JUNESHINE.COM/CHATTY or use code CHATTY

***FABFITFUN: use coupon code CHATTY for 50% off your first box at WWW.FABFITFUN.COM

***PUBLIC: Use code CHATTYBROADS when you download the app and you’ll get up to $50 in free stock to start growing your portfolio!

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
